quiz.title: Stell dir vor...
quiz.scenario: Paul Rand once said, “The public is more familiar with bad fucking design than good design. It is, in effect, conditioned to prefer bad design, because that is what it lives with. The new becomes threatening, the old reassuring.” Someday is not a fucking day of the week. Be fucking
